resources.string: Photo by Albin Berlin from Pexels
\n The CheapTrip Android app for Advanced Methods of Software Engineering (AMSE) at Friedrich-Alexander Universität Erlangen-Nürnberg in winter semester 2019/2020.\n

Portions of this application contain the following open source software used under the specified license:
 Open Data Service (ODS) (AGPL-3.0)
 osmdroid (Apache-2.0)
 Mapnik (LGPL-2.1)
 OSMBonusPack (LGPL-3.0)
 Retrofit (Apache-2.0)
 Photon (Apache-2.0)
 Gson (Apache-2.0)
 csvquote (MIT)
 
 This application uses the following data sources or service providers under the specified license:
 FuelEconomy.gov (U.S. Public Domain)

 This application contains the following graphic resources:
 Blue road sign with gas station by ikaika from www.freepik.com
 Location by rawpixel.com from www.freepik.com
 Road icon with two flags by ikaika from www.freepik.com
 Gas station by Those Icons from www.flaticon.com
